Array.word: The Treasure Bowl of Madness has a chance to appear in games. Defeating it grants lots of rewards.
The Treasure Vault of Madness will now appear in random rooms. When you enter the Treasure Vault of Madness, you will encounter a giant Treasure Bowl of Madness.
Lady Blood will appear at the transfer station and sell powerful gear to you for Red Souls.
After unlocking the Sword Mausoleum in the Base Mausoleum, you can choose a divine weapon from the Sword Mausoleum, but the difficulty cannot be increased after clearing a level in selection mode.
After unlocking the Treasury in the Base Mausoleum, you can choose a relic from the Treasury, but the difficulty cannot be increased after clearing a level in selection mode.
Allows you to spend Red Souls to unseal divine weapons and remove them from the drop list.
Allows you to spend Red Souls to unseal relics and remove them from the drop list.
The thief lets you take 2 extra rewards with you.
The Soulsmith lets you use Red Souls to enhance and enchant divine weapons.
Unlocks a new sect statue: Shadow-Walker.
Red Souls can be used to lock affixes.
You lose HP over time after starting the game. The more HP you have, the faster you lose HP, but you gain 10% Lifesteal when dealing any damage.
Your Movement Speed is reduced by 80%, and you can't get any Movement Speed bonuses, but the dashing distance and invincibility duration are increased.
All monsters gain Lifesteal. When hitting the player, mobs recover 12% HP and bosses recover 5% HP.
Bosses have 50% more HP and deal 40% more damage.
All non-boss monsters have 100% more HP and deal 30% more damage.
All monsters take 50% less damage from Melee and Flying Sword attacks and take 25% extra Elemental DMG.
All monsters take 50% less Elemental DMG and take 25% more Melee and Flying Sword DMG.
Your Max HP is reduced by 50%, and all damage taken by you is increased by 20%.
All non-boss enemies' Movement Speed is increased by 25%.
0.5s after a normal enemy dies, a bloody explosion with a radius of 1.5 meters will occur, dealing True DMG equal to 10% of the player's Max HP and inflicting Bleeding for 5s.
Increases ATK by 30% until you arrive at the next transfer station.
Increases Blue Souls gained by 100% until you arrive at the next transfer station.
Tentacles will not appear until you arrive at the next transfer station.
Reduces enemies' ATK by 50% until you arrive at the next transfer station.
Reduces enemies' HP by 30% until you arrive at the next transfer station.
Reduces Ranged DMG received by 50% until you arrive at the next transfer station.
Increases Elemental DMG dealt by 30% until you arrive at the next transfer station.
Deals 50% additional True DMG until you arrive at the next transfer station.
Reduces Melee DMG taken by 30% until you arrive at the next transfer station.

Increases the ATK of non-boss monsters by 100% until you arrive at the next transfer station.
<color=#89E7A0>Reward: Receive 2 <color=#E57E00>Sect Skill Books</color> when arriving at the next transfer station.</color>

Increases the ATK of non-boss monsters by 20% until you arrive at the next transfer station.
<color=#89E7A0>Reward: Receive 1 <color=#E57E00>Sect Skill Book</color> when arriving at the next transfer station.</color>

Increases the HP of non-boss monsters by 40% until you arrive at the next transfer station.
<color=#89E7A0>Reward: Receive lots of Blue Souls when arriving at the next transfer station.</color>

Increases the ATK of non-boss monsters by 50% until you arrive at the next transfer station.
<color=#89E7A0>Reward: Receive 1 random <color=#E57E00>Legendary Relic</color> when arriving at the next transfer station.</color>

Increases the HP and ATK of non-boss monsters by 20% until you arrive at the next transfer station.
<color=#89E7A0>Reward: After arriving at the next transfer station, increases the player's ATK by 15% in the current game.</color>

Increases the ATK and Movement Speed of non-boss monsters by 20% until you arrive at the next transfer station.
<color=#89E7A0>Reward: After arriving at the next transfer station, increases your Elemental DMG by 15% in the current game.</color>

Increases the HP of enemies by 30% until you arrive at the next transfer station.
<color=#89E7A0>Reward: After arriving at the next transfer station, increases the player's DEF by 10% in the current game.</color>

Increases the HP and ATK of enemies by 30% until you arrive at the next transfer station.
<color=#89E7A0>Reward: After arriving at the next transfer station, each attack made in the current game deals an additional <color=#E35428>Fire DMG</color> equal to 30% of ATK.</color>

Increases the HP and ATK of enemies by 30% until you arrive at the next transfer station.
<color=#89E7A0>Reward: After arriving at the next transfer station, each attack made in the current game deals an additional <color=#73D7F1>Ice DMG</color> equal to 30% of ATK.</color>

Increases the HP and ATK of enemies by 30% until you arrive at the next transfer station.
<color=#89E7A0>Reward: After arriving at the next transfer station, each attack made in the current game deals an additional <color=#F3ED56>Lightning DMG</color> equal to 30% of ATK.</color>

・Upon coming into contact with a spider, all your damage dealt will be increased by 5% for 10s. Stacks up to 8 times.
・Enemies inflicted with [Nightmare Thunder] increases the stack of [Shocked] from 1 to 2.

・Enemies inflicted with [Nightmare Thunder] have a 15% chance to trigger [Nightmare Furious Thunder] and deal 350% True Lightning DMG if they receive another Lightning DMG within 3s. Nightmare Level +1.
・[Nightmare Thunder] becomes True Lightning DMG, increasing all damage taken by the enemies by 25% for 3s.
・When HP is at 100%, all damage is increased to 100%. True DMG inflicted on enemies is increased to 40%. But the first damage taken is also increased by 400%.
・Similar effects also apply when HP is above 30% but below 80%. However, only 1/4 of the original effect will apply.
・When HP is below 30%, each enemy kill recovers 2% HP.
・Ice DMG dealt to [Frozen] enemies will deal 25% more True DMG.

・Upon dealing damage with Frostspikes, inflict [Fragile] on enemies for 4s. Stacks up to 10 times. Each stack of [Fragile] grants a 5% chance for affected enemies to take 3× damage upon taking Ice DMG. Nightmare Level +1.
・[Nightmare Black Hole] also increases all damage taken by enemies within range by 20%.
・The absorption speed and range of [Nightmare Black Hole] are both increased by 30%.
・When [Nightmare Black Hole] vanishes, it will trigger the Nightmare Super Nova to deal 500% True DMG to enemies within a wide range. Nightmare Level +1.
・Upon attacking any [Terrified] enemy, you deal an additional 70% True DMG. Nightmare Level +1.
・When [Terrified] is triggered, increases damage by 5% for every [Terrified] enemy (lasts 5s and stacks up to 20 times)
・For [Terrified] enemies, they will receive additional True DMG equal to 10% of Max HP with the status ends (not exceeding 600% of the player's ATK). Nightmare Level +1.
・Increases the trigger chance of [Grip of Greed] by 50%. Nightmare Level +1.
・When the Weapon Explosion of [Grip of Greed] deals damage, there's a 15% to recover 5% of Max HP for you (can be triggered up to once every 3s).
・[Grip of Madness] increases the Combo Rate of the Madness Hammer by 17%. Nightmare Level +1.
・[Grip of Madness] has a 15% higher chance of summoning the Madness Hammer.
・Prayer Beads from [Grip of Arrogance], upon retrieval, forms a circle around you and explodes, dealing 400% True DMG per bead. Nightmare Level +1.
・When Prayer Beads from [Grip of Arrogance] are retrieved, every enemy hit restores 1% of your Max HP.
・When [Grip of Obedience] triggers [Blind Worship], shoots out 16 Nightmare Petals to all directions. Each petal deals 200% True DMG. Nightmare Level +1.
・Duration of [Blind Worship] triggered by [Grip of Obedience] is extended by 30%.
・The trigger chance of the Scarlet Flying Sword from [Grip of Lust] is increased by 25%. Nightmare Level +1.
・When [Grip of Lust] triggers the Scarlet Outburst, shoots out 5 Scarlet Flying Swords to nearby areas.
・[Into the Nightmare] also increases All DMG dealt by 50%. Nightmare Level +1.
・[Into the Nightmare] also increases your Max HP by 100%. Nightmare Level +1.
・[Into the Nightmare] also increases your DEF by 30%. Nightmare Level +1.
Wake up! Trust me and wake up now!
Wake up! Don't allow yourself to be deceived!
You've been trapped for far too long.
This moment has finally come. I'll entrust what remains of my power to you... This Buddha of Clarity will help you resist the nightmares...
We finally meet again. I see you've received Seventh's power...

You shall face countless temptations. The monsters of the abyss are master pretenders, so do not allow your heart to waver. Steel yourself and forge ahead... This final remnant of power... is yours...
You're finally here. I've been waiting for far too long...
Never believe anything that seems familiar, no matter how real they may seem... This final remnant of power is yours, use it and pierce through the veil of deceit...
Perhaps you're wondering who we are and why we are helping you, but no matter, please believe us... Seeing is believing, after all.
These monsters will do everything in their power to trap you in this nightmare. Our time is running out, take my power and go!
Oh, you're here! So Seven won the bet, huh? My dear Seven, you may have won the bet, but you're not with us anymore...
Take my power too... I hope our efforts do not go to waste...
I'm not seeing things, am I? You're finally here... It seems our hard work was not done in vain...
Perhaps your next decision will be a very difficult one, but I believe that you can overcome it. You must escape this time...
You're here at last. I see the others have entrusted their power to you... Take me in your hands, and I will use what's left of my power to open the gates of this endless cage...
It has been a difficult journey, and we are sincerely happy for you... Unfortunately, our journey ends here. You must rely on yourself from now on...
Hey! What are you doing here?! Lu Kunhai has a huge stash of treasure! Let's split it and enjoy carefree days for the rest of our lives!
It would be a pity not to steal from Lu Kunhai!
Hehe! What do you think about building our own empire with the loot?
Stop! Stop hitting me. We'll split it seventy-thirty, alright? You're doing most of the work, so you get the lion's share. No complaints now, right?
You want it all? Then I guess we'll let our fists do the talking!
Oh! You want this one, and you like that one... Then take this!
I'll give you a few extra! Here, take them!
You've saved the world, so trust me on this. You deserve all the wealth and glory, so let's get rich together!
Seriously, this isn't a wise choice.
Wealth isn't a necessity, and my desire for it is not that strong...
Whoa! You came at just the right time! Now that I have this Soul Forge, just bring me a billion souls and I'll forge you a divine weapon that can save the world!
Hey, I can't work without enough souls!
Hey! Patience is a virtue! Just start collecting those souls for now!
Are you that desperate for a spar? We can do it once I've forged the divine weapon for you!
You've gone too far! You leave me no choice but to sacrifice your soul for my masterpiece!
With a thousand swings of the hammer!
This hammer is really good! I think I'll test it on you!
You don't stand a chance without the divine weapon...
Bahahaha! This world will be saved once the divine weapon is forged! So, are you ready to embark on this journey?
Fine, just continue wasting time over there! Coward!
Wait! Will this really save the world?
That shortsighted old fogey, Zhao, was always against my human experiments! But it's clear now that mechanically modified bodies can resist the effects of warm snow.
What are you doing? It's the best way to stop the warm snow!
Trust me! Mechanical modifications will lead the way to a new era!
After going through so much, do you still not understand? If we do not abandon our flesh, we will eventually turn into mindless monsters!
Hmph! It seems your ignorance rivals Zhao Changgeng! The modifications are complete! Now kneel before the power of my mechanical modifications and welcome the next stage of evolution!
You live up to your reputation! You are worthy of witnessing my power that rivals the gods!
The world is but a cruel place that treats all of us like trash!
NO! My mechanical modification... is the last hope to save the world! But you've destroyed it all!
Quickly install this part and save the world with me!
Why are you hesitating? It's the only way!
Since it's the only way, it had to be done…
I understand now! This white lotus is a symbol of mother, and the sacred snow is a blessing from her! It will cleanse all evil from this world!
Mother gave you that power, so bow down and give thanks!
Great mother will forgive you! Never forget that she gave you everything!
How dare you disobey her? It seems some punishment is in order!
Kneel thrice and kowtow nine times to express your piety!
The white lotus descends to deliver us all!
May the lotus cleanse the world!
Great mother! Give me the strength to punish this unfilial child!
Punishment of thorns! Torment the evil!
Forgive me... great mother... I've failed you...
Kneel, child. Let us repent together.
Do you not understand? This is the only path to salvation!
I will do as you say, Father.
This is not the ending I want...
You're late! Today's a happy day, so what are you still standing there for?
Why...? What did I do wrong? What am I lacking?
How can you just leave while everyone is watching?!
Even if it's just a dream, how I wish you would rest in my arms...
This dream... cannot be allowed to end like this...
Hurry up and get changed! Everyone is waiting for us!
Sorry, I'm late. I'll get changed right now.
*The difficulty system does not apply to The Ash of Nightmare
Death Knight's Letter Written in Blood
New Heart of All Things Plan
Lu Shiyi's Letter Written in Blood
Notes of a Maid of Imperial Villa
Fragments of the Clan's Important Records

The painting portrays a young woman, adorned with a green jade pendant, in a mist-filled town of Jiangnan. The inscription on the back of the painting reads: "To Shiyi. May destiny bless us with a life intertwined until death separates us."
The front side of the jade pendant is engraved with the word "Qing," while the back side is engraved with "Yi."

This letter appears to be a direct order issued by Lu Kunhai to a trusted ally: "Keep a close eye on my foolish brother. He must not know that A-Qing is already dead... At least until I seize the throne. We still need to harness his power..."
The genealogy of the Lu clan. The latest page of which reads: "Eldest Son - Kunhai, Eldest Daughter - Shuying, Second Son..." Unfortunately, the name of the second son has been obscured...
The letter reads: "Dear brother, the Emperor has grown old and feeble, and my son has come of age. The goal of our clan will finally be fulfilled..."
"The time has come for the Boar to rise."
"Mom went to your auntie's place to get some food for you and your sister. If I don't come back... take your sister and hide... and... please take care of her..."
A small steamed bun that is rotten and definitely inedible. Due to being tightly clenched for a long time, it has taken on the shape of such a grip...

The Blood Seal is a powerful spell that relies on a primary bloodline and four secondary bloodlines to be cast and sustain. The primary bloodline provides the seal's enduring power, which the secondary bloodlines are not able to. To undo the seal, the primary bloodline must eliminate the providers of the secondary bloodlines. Each secondary bloodline provider slain weakens the seal.

451 years ago, Lord Ji Yan, the patriarch of the Dragon, led the four great clans – Tiger, Tortoise, Crane, and Boar – and ended the Serpent's 7000-year reign, putting an end to their kingdom which relied on the powers of their patron god, Heluo. With the combined power of the five great clans, they sealed the ancient malevolent god within the Dragon Vein via a blood seal. Lord Ji Yan then proclaimed himself Emperor, and the four great clans were ennobled. This marked the beginning of the Year of the Dragon. Their capital was erected on the Dragon Vein, and for generations, they harnessed the power of the Dragon Blood to contain the malevolent god...

One of the ancient deities of the sea. It is said to take the form of a massive sea creature with ten bodies with a single head... It also walks among us in various human forms, sometimes as a child, a man, a young maiden, or sometimes even an old woman or man...
...Year 3 of the Dragon Calendar, Consort Qin gave birth to a son named Lan...

...Year 3 of the Dragon Calendar, on the day of the winter solstice, a fire broke out in the Jade Palace due to the improper arrangement of charcoal, resulting in the tragic deaths of Lady Qin and Prince Lan...

...Year 1 of the Dragon Calendar, Emperor appointed Lu, the second daughter of the Boar, as the Queen... In the second year of the Dragon Calendar, Emperor took Qin, the third daughter of the Tiger, as his concubine, and that same year, Qin conceived a child of the Dragon lineage...
...In the twenty-third year of the Dragon Calendar, winter, Emperor fell ill and appointed Li as the Crown Prince...

...Year 24 of the Dragon Calendar, the Emperor's health deteriorated and a mysterious illness spread throughout the palace as unusual vines and white flowers began to grow in the great hall. The Emperor immediately commanded that they be uprooted and burned.

...The strange illness and peculiar phenomena spreading in the palace are believed to be caused by the malevolent being sealed within the Dragon Veins. This indicates that the seal has begun to weaken... This matter requires the utmost attention.
...White lotuses spread from beneath the palace, and no matter how they are cut down or burned, the vines quickly grow back...

...Currently, the best course of action seems to be having Crown Prince Li ascend to the throne and utilizing the new Dragon Blood to subdue the evil god within the Dragon Veins. However, for unknown reasons, the Queen and the head of the Boar strongly oppose this approach...

...Zhao has developed a new type of seal to enhance the original Blood Seal. It directly connects the Dragon bloodline to the Dragon Veins, amplifying the restraining power but causing the recipient to fall into a state of deep slumber. However, if the recipient does not possess the Dragon bloodline, they will be consumed by the Dragon Veins, leading to their death...
...This substance is not ordinary snow. When magnified several times, it appears to be some kind of living organism...

...Once an individual inhales this substance, they will undergo changes within two hours. In the initial stage, symptoms such as chills, fever, and coughing up blood will occur, followed by hallucinations. Eventually, the person will lose their sanity and undergo a transformation into an inhuman creature...

...Through comparing samples taken near the white lotus eruption site and various other locations, it is observed that the further away from the white lotuses, the lower the biological activity in the Warm Snow, resulting in a lesser impact on living organisms...
"Oh, the omniscient and omnipotent Mother, as per your decree, the child found by the river has now grown into adulthood... By your command, he is about to embark on his trial..."

"Those blessed by the Great Benevolent Mother shall transcend the cycle of life and death, and become fearless in the face of mortality. The Mother shall return you to the mortal realm ever so tirelessly..."
There are no true benevolent gods in this world. The gods will not save humanity. The whispers heard by man may originate from something much more sinister.

"I may not have much time left. Perhaps this is the consequence I deserve. I have many sins to repent for... My greatest remorse is being coerced by the Queen to assist in the murder of Lady Qin and Prince Lan. However, I did not kill Prince Lan. I placed him in a small wooden barrel by the river. If fate was kind to him, he should be around twenty-five years of age now..."

This letter seems to have been around for some time. The words have faded and are barely legible. It vaguely reads: "That darn woman and her bastard child must die before the beginning of winter. Once you succeed, you shall have all the wealth you can dream of, but if you were to fail..."
"I kept on having the same nightmare over and over again lately... That kid... has returned to exact his vengeance..."

"I heard that a massive white lotus has grown at the top of the Imperial City. His Majesty has urgently summoned the heads of the Four Clans, and the clan masters rushed into the palace... Something bad is happening..."
"We failed to carry out the sealing ritual... What can we truly safeguard? Is this kingdom truly doomed, as foretold by the ancient pact?

"What eludes me is that... We followed everything to the letter in accordance with the ancient seal. There shouldn't have been any issues with each step of the Blood Seal. So how did it fail? What exactly went wrong...?"
"Ever since My Lady's return from the palace, her behavior grew increasingly peculiar. She locks herself inside the Tower of Fate, studying god-knows-what... And now, even her sister is missing...
"Dammit! What a waste of time... We failed even though I had to take the field personally... How useless are they!? What's the use of taking the world if we couldn't even defeat this evil?"

"When the Blood Seal was activated, I saw a group of stars in the spell... They sent down a decree, whispering ceaselessly in my ears... Stop, stop, stop, stop, stop, stop, stop, stop, stop..." The same phrase continued until the end of the letter.
A crimson wax-like substance that closely resembles blood. Thinking back, it seems that there were numerous statues made of this along the way...

"Damn that Old Zhao! If he had just let me bring in the final batch of test subjects, I could've completed the research! Flesh Ascension would've been finished long ago if it weren't for him! That old fool can’t save anyone in the end. My way is the only way to save this world..."

By using the Blood Wax to seal the physical body within a special container, the Spirit-Flesh Separation Technique can then be used to extract and transfer the soul to an automaton. As long as the physical body remains intact, the automaton can endure. However, currently, there are instances of the physical body becoming animated without the presence of the soul for unknown reasons. If I can obtain a thousand more samples, I should be able to resolve this issue quickly...
This is the last of my strength... If you see this message, trust me, this is the last chance you have in saving the world. Please seize it...

If you have reached this point, you have already taken the first steps... From this point forward, you face various temptations, but you would do well to trust none. The Deceivers will disguise themselves as familiar faces, sparing no expense to keep you trapped in this world of illusions...

The Deceivers are crazed nightmare creatures. They mostly follow their master's command, but there are always a few that act on their own whims. Some of these even believe that the best deception is the one without any disguise...

Maybe you are questioning whether this hyper-realistic world is truly an illusion, but I implore you to trust me. The illusions are real-world projections created by the deity, Heluo, with the intention of trapping you here forever...

I know you have questions, such as why you are trapped here in the first place. Even before you unleashed Heluo, you have been sent back to the mortal realm repeatedly by Heluo; your souls are already intertwined. Now, even for a deity like Heluo, it is no easy task to remove you...
Friend, I don't know how battles you have fought in this endless cycle... The hardest challenge is coming up next, and the answers you seek lie beyond...
"Here lies the remains of Li Guang. Year 30 of the Dragon Calendar. Loving daughter, Ling Long." is engraved on the stone tablet covered in warm snow.

"Soon after you entered the giant pit, the white lotus started erupting uncontrollably... When we ventured into the deep pit, all we found was a destroyed throne and your unconscious figure... Bi'an, what happened in there? Wake up! Help us..." This piece of paper looks old, but numerous ring-shaped wrinkles of various sizes can still be clearly discerned on it, as if it was wet by something...

"According to the anecdotes left behind by Bi'an, all of this is pointing toward a truth that no one wants to believe—the Benevolent Mother is Heluo. Father and all of us have become pawns in its evil plans... Should I tell everyone about this? I'm afraid that Father won't be able to accept this fact..."
Father left, and Bi'an is still unconscious. I can't allow myself to stay depressed like this! I must get myself together! They still need a leader...

The ink on this paper has gradually faded over the years, but Ling Long's writing can still be discerned—"From today onward, we no longer belong to the Benevolent Mother and are officially known as the Heluo Resistance Army. We will retake our world at all costs..."
"Our primary mission is to search for survivors. We must gather more strength..." It seems to be written in Ling Long's handwriting.
An old list packed with names written in blood.

In this moment of life and death, we have no choice but to activate Project Flesh Ascension. Mechanically modified bodies are more capable of resisting those insane monsters. If you would like to participate in the project, please sign your name on the list...
We may have found a way to awaken Bi'an, but it requires retrieving the Heart of All Things. God knows how many will lose their lives on this trip...

Today is the second anniversary of Father's death, and the Heluo Resistance Army is growing stronger by the day. Although Bi'an is still unconscious, I am confident that I can persevere with everyone!
Today is a day worth celebrating. We conquered Wolf Fang Pass. Now everyone has more space to live in!

Today, the Death Knights finally returned with the Heart of All Things, but we lost Wolf Fang Pass... We've never felt so defeated... Oh, Bi'an, I beg you... Wake up! You've been sleeping for ten years! Please... Give us your help again...
An exquisite key-shaped object. Although its use is unknown, Ling Long repeatedly advised to keep it safe...

Bi'an, if you are reading this letter, it means we no longer exist... During your slumber, we finally learned what kind of battle you have been fighting. In order to ensure we can really save the world this time, we found a way to imitate the Heluo Spell of Samsara. So long as the Key of Samsara I gave you remains in your possession, the timeline will reset upon your fall. This is all the information I can leave you. Please stay strong! You will definitely save the world this time! —Ling Long

Remnants of the Heluo spell still remain within him... According to our analysis, the spell is triggered upon the death of the host... It can be reactivated if a huge amount of energy is poured in at that instant. At present, the only thing capable of supplying that much energy... is probably the Heart of All Things that Zhao left behind...

"Ancestors of the Lu family, an unfilial descendant, Lu Kunhai, attempted to seize the throne and even experimented with forbidden techniques on his sister-in-law, A-Qing, ultimately turning her into a monster! I swear to eliminate this disgrace from our family!"

"What the heck is this place? It took us two months to find this place, yet we've almost lost our entire team in just a few days! We can't stay here any longer. I hope these things are what Lord Lu is searching for..."

"Although it differs slightly from my expectations, it's still a pleasant surprise. The potion mixed with the target's blood grants extremely high vitality, and a massive increase in physique and strength. Even having a limb severed does not affect the subject."
"The patriarch recently adopted a strange... baby girl? She looks utterly pale, and there are even scales on her face. Is she really human?"

"My wife's body prevented her from having children, but the Sima family cannot go without an heir. After raising the serpent girl for eighteen years, it is now time for her to repay the favor. I hope my descendants will use this opportunity to take over the important task of writing the history of our family."

"The Serpent Clan does not marry outsiders. They possess extremely long lifespans, and their appearances differ from ordinary people—They possess white skin, slender figures, and scales on their temples and body."

"I went to the beach today, and I made a friend who looks very much like me. She said her name was Feng Yue, and she was forced to hide alone on this island due to her strange appearance which is disliked by most people. But it's different now. She has met me, and we will be best friends."

"My child is about to be born, and I look forward to his birth every day. But today, Feng Yue told me that we are from the Serpent Clan, and we are shunned by the world. My child will be taken away to be put on trial upon his birth, and we will never see each other again. No, I won't allow anyone to take him from me... Our god has been sealed away. I promised Feng Yue that I would join the plan to rescue our god. If my child can absorb our god's power, then we will succeed..."
"My lady... She's talking to herself again... According to Granny, she was like this even as a child, but it wasn't this obvious. It has been growing increasingly frequent lately."
"She's always speaking to herself. It's as if someone is standing beside her... The twins she gave birth to have been sent back to the clan in secret."
"One night, I saw the woman covered in scales. She was walking toward the sea. She refused to turn back no matter how I shouted, and she just walked until I could see her no more."
"Lock down the imperial villa. No one is allowed to approach it, and do not reveal any information about Yin or the punishment is death."
"Send the purest offering to the sea, and the gods will look down upon you; offer your flesh and blood to the earth, and the gods will protect you."

This is a genealogy that records the information of every member of a certain clan for thousands of years. Some names are crossed out with red lines. The gaps between the crossed-out names are inconsistent, so it is impossible to determine a pattern. The only known fact is the owners of many names are not very old.
"Dedicated to the greatest and selfless god. May your power and will spread swiftly throughout the land." is written in scarlet lettering.

Blessed by Heluo, the Divine Empress received supreme divine powers. Under the Divine Empress's leadership, the Serpent Clan went from being on the defense to offense, and they swept through many clans and conquered most of the world...

One hundred and forty years after ascending the throne, the Divine Empress passed away, sent off by sacred snow descending from the sky, and the people benefited from this. The Serpent Clan stood above all other clans and reigned supreme...

The Dread Empress organized the sacrificial rules into yearly and monthly sacrifices. Whenever war or disaster plagued them, a divine sacrifice would be added. Boars would be cooked, sheep slaughtered, and the evil executed. From then on, favorable times arrived and the future generations were blessed...

"Someone always never comes back whenever we go out to sea. Why would Grandma give those bad guys what we risked our lives to obtain? We are almost out of the land. Are we going to be driven into the sea?"
"Even after sacrificing so many people, my mother still didn't get the opportunity to migrate inland, and those outsiders demanded more instead. In contrast, the sea is our true home!"

"Little Fish, oh, Little Fish. If I agree to your request, would you help me strike down these villains before me and make the Serpent Clan strong? Then from today onward, the Serpent Clan will become your advocate and spread news of your greatness to every inch of these lands!"

The mysterious and evil power of the Serpent Clan is rendered unusable around the holy mountain at the center of the continent. One day, someone descended the mountain and established a clan with the dragon as its totem and led the fight against the Serpent Clan's tyranny. The Lu Clan responded to the call and migrated to the foot of the holy mountain, and the Boar Clan was formed.

"The Great Mother is subject to great constraints, and it is only after our clan's expansion that her power gradually spread throughout the land. Her power can only be fully displayed at sea, yet she yearns so greatly for the land, and so when our clan's banner fills the land, perhaps only then will the Great Mother truly descend."

"The gods of the ocean cannot set foot on land, yet they can support the Serpent Clan to overcome the restrictions. It is an agreement between the gods, and there must be a way for me to join this wager."

An album of the portraits of the Serpent Clan's rulers from every generation, and it includes their names and posthumous names. It is in the order of the Divine Empress of Serpent · Feng Yue, the Dread Empress of Serpent · Feng Wang... It is clear that only Feng Yue maintained her human appearance.
"The scales have tipped, and the ancient boundary has begun to blur. Follow the will of god, guide the path ashore."
A boy of the Serpent Clan born on a Yin day of the lunar calendar is circled with a red line and marked as "yearly contribution."
"Dedicate your body to the almighty god, and your spirit will enter paradise. The most devout believers will gain extreme power."
"After arriving in this chaotic world, I can only sense bodily pain and the passage of time. Have I been exiled? I want to go back! Let me go back!"

"One of the ocean god's powers is to create a mental world that satisfies your every desire. Only eternal damnation awaits those who succumb to it. If this prison is broken, thousands remain to take its place like an endless cycle, so only the strong-willed can break free on their own."

"The death of the serpent girl should have been good news, but unusual snow descended from the sky, causing an upheaval of the animals, plants to wither, misfortune to fill the clan, and the frequent death of our people in their dreams. Yet at a time like this, the Serpent Clan's aggression intensified, their soldiers attacked like madmen without fear of pain, and the clan was powerless to resist and forced to submit."
"The Serpent Clan worships the god Heluo, who manifests in their minds. And for thousands of years, Heluo has appeared in the likeness of the Divine Empress of Serpent."

"Weak, pitiable, hateful, lost, and has an affinity for the ocean. You are the advocate I need. Believe in me, support me, and I shall help you bring prosperity to your clan. One day, the entire world will grow mad because of you."

From the ancient times of chaos to the bustling world of the present, and from the long nights to the glimmer of dawn, heroes always drive away the madness.
From the creation of language to the construction of steel forests, and from youth to manhood, even heroes may find themselves lost.
Although the story will eventually come to an end, and reality is never without obstruction, a hero is eternal while the flame within still burns.
No matter small or great, mediocre or extraordinary.
This time,
Please let me formally address you—Hero!

Lu Shiyi is the second son of the Lu family, and the younger brother of Lu Kunhai and Lu Shuying. He possesses exceptional talent in swordsmanship but left home due to his refusal to accept the family's plot for usurping the throne. On his journey as a wanderer, Shiyi encountered a girl named A-Qing and fell in love with her. On the day when the Warm Snow fell, A-Qing fell severely ill, and Shiyi had to bring her back to the Boar Mansion for treatment. In order to save A-Qing, Shiyi was forced to work for Kunhai. However, it turned out that Kunhai never had any intentions of helping A-Qing and, instead, transformed her into a monstrous being.

After marrying into the royal family, Lu Shuying, with the assistance of Lu Kunhai, gradually ascended to the position of Queen. Now, with the Emperor growing old and weak, they are preparing to seize power and take the world for their own...

As the Warm Snow fell, in their innocence, the children just enjoyed themselves, as carefree as ever. However, the siblings from the Li family contracted a strange illness while playing in the snow. Their mother believed that as long as the children were well-fed and warmly dressed, they would be able to get through it. But it just so happened that a riot broke out in the city. Despite the danger, their mother went to a nearby relative's house to ask for some food. However, she never returned. Whether in life or in death, the older brother took care of his younger sister, waiting for their mother to come back...

Before the first ray of light cast down upon the Year of the Dragon, the Serpent, devoted followers of the deity Heluo, held tyrannical rule over this land for over seven thousand years. They acquired the power of Heluo by offering them human sacrifices. But history is an ocean, and kings are but solitary boats. Eventually, the Serpent's reign was ended by a rebellion led by the Dragon, ultimately bringing about its downfall...

Year 3 of the Dragon Calendar, on the day of the Winter Solstice, a fire broke out in the Jade Palace due to improper arrangements of charcoal, resulting in the tragic deaths of Lady Qin Yuci, the second daughter of the Tiger and the consort of the Emperor, along with the Crown Prince Lan. It is indeed peculiar that such a fire occurred within the tightly guarded confines of the Imperial Palace, especially after the birth of the Emperor's heir by the consort...

Year 24 of the Dragon Calendar, the Emperor fell ill to a mysterious disease that began to spread within the Imperial Palace as unusual vines and white flowers began to grow on palace grounds. The Emperor immediately issued an order for Zhao to find a cure for the disease.

Year 27 of the Dragon Calendar, a massive lotus flower appeared atop the Dragon Palace, impervious to any attempts to cut it down or set it ablaze. The white lotus periodically spewed countless white powdery substances into the air, creating a phenomenon akin to snowfall, albeit without the coldness. This phenomenon later came to be known as "Warm Snow." Zhao Changgeng proposed that Crown Prince Li should ascend the throne to use his newly gained bloodline to subdue the lotus' power, but it was fiercely opposed by both the Queen and Lu Kunhai. With no other choice, Zhao, along with other clans, used the Sword Tomb Seal to bind the Emperor and the throne together...

Year 28 of the Dragon Calendar, white powdery living organisms spewed from the massive white lotus have spread across the land. They resemble snowflakes in appearance but lack the coldness. Anyone who inhales these airborne spores will succumb to a peculiar illness. However, the potency of the Warm Snow weakens the farther the victim is from the eruption point.

Year 4 of the Dragon Calendar, grieving the loss of his wife and child, the Emperor initiated a massive construction project to build the Restful Palace, causing great suffering among the people. Among them, a laborer named Li Guang rose up and founded the religion Pingtian, which quickly spread throughout the streets and alleys. As the Imperial Court began to suppress Pingtian, Li Guang dreamed of Guanyin, the Benevolent Mother. Following Guanyin's divine decree, Li Guang led his followers north to establish the religion, The Benevolent Mother...

25 years ago, during the fire at the Jade Palace, Lady Qin entrusted Lan to Yuying, a palace maid, instructing her to take Lan out of the palace. What Lady Qin didn't know was that Yuying had already been bribed. However, Yuying could not bring herself to kill the child, so she placed Lan in a wooden barrel and cast him into the river...

July of year 27, the Emperor's health suddenly deteriorated. A massive vine grew from beneath the throne in the Dragon Palace, piercing through the top of the grand hall and forming a colossal lotus bud, impervious to any attempts to cut it down or set it ablaze. In his critical state, the Emperor urgently summoned the Four Clans, attempting to strengthen the Blood Seal to contain the situation. However, the sealing ritual failed and backfired, causing a surge in the growth of the lotus, which began spewing out white powdery substances into the air periodically. Everything was done in accordance with the ancient pact, and every step was executed flawlessly... No one knew the reason why it failed...

July of year 27, the Emperor's health suddenly deteriorated. A massive vine grew from beneath the throne in the Dragon Palace, piercing through the top of the grand hall and forming a colossal lotus bud, impervious to any attempts to cut it down or set it ablaze. In his critical state, the Emperor urgently summoned the Four Clans, attempting to strengthen the Blood Seal to contain the situation. However, the sealing ritual failed and backfired, causing a surge in the growth of the lotus, which began spewing out white powdery substances into the air periodically. Everything was done in accordance with the ancient pact, and even Lu Kunhai, with his own evil agendas, gave his all. Only the Stars and Sima Ying knew the reason why it failed...

During the initial Warm Snow outbreak, Mo Wentian proposed Project Flesh Ascension to Zhao Changgeng. The plan involved using Blood Wax to separate the physical body from the spiritual essence, and combining it with mechanical modifications to create a new life form immune to the effects of Warm Snow. However, due to the need for cruel and extensive experimentation, Zhao terminated the project, imprisoned Mo Wentian, and buried a large number of test subjects in the Flesh Dungeon beneath Mansion of Enigma.

After the seal was broken, in order to trap the deceived hero in an endless cycle, the ancient deity sent forth its minions, the Deceivers, to infiltrate the hero world. These Deceivers would disguise themselves as trusted companions, guiding the hero through increasingly insane trials, time and time again.

In order to break the Blood Seal, the pawn must be immortal. Even if there is only one successful attempt among countless failures, the seal can be broken. During the process of repeatedly returning the pawn to the mortal realm, a subtle connection was formed between the ancient deity and the pawn. It was only when the deity wished to dispose of this pawn did the deity learn of this link that could not be easily severed...

The followers of the Benevolent Mother witnessed the descent of destruction in the Imperial City, and at the same time, their hero fell unconscious. Uncertainty plagued them all. Prophet Pingtian, who attempted to make sense of it all, could no longer hear the decree of the divine. The Benevolent Mother was temporarily without a leader. After Ling Long investigated the anecdotes Bi'an left behind, she uncovered the shocking truth that the Benevolent Mother was being used by Heluo. Prophet Pingtian found himself incapable of accepting this fact and soon went mad from his guilt. In the end, he passed away drowning in madness and regret...

Year 30 of the Dragon Calendar - In order to make up for the mistakes of the Benevolent Mother, Ling Long brought the survivors together and established the Heluo Resistance Army. The Heluo Resistance Army led by Ling Long began to search for survivors and fought against the ever-increasing mutated monsters. The resistance army grows in number with each passing day...

Year 37 of the Dragon Calendar - Based on the anecdotes left behind by Bi'an, Mo Wentian inferred that Bi'an's consciousness was trapped in a dream, and the only way to awaken the hero was by sending a team of modified Mechanical Death Knights to retrieve the greatest creation of man—the Heart of All Things.

The world did not receive its salvation after Bi'an released Heluo. During the ten years Bi'an remained unconscious, the Heluo Resistance Army finally saw hope under their combined efforts with Ling Long. However, in the face of madness and despair, everything is just so fragile...

Year 38 of the Dragon Calendar - Through the anecdotes left behind by Bi'an, the Heluo Resistance Army discovered that Bi'an had been in a constant cycle of rebirth in this world. Mo Wentian used the power of the Heart of All Things and the remnants of Heluo's power within Bi'an to forge the Key of Samsara—a key that would allow Bi'an to reset the timeline even without the help of Heluo.

Lu Kunhai feared the Dragon Emperor's condition would take a turn for the better and secretly sent a special team to sneak into the underwater ruins of Crane Island. The team managed to retrieve a portion of the Serpent Dynasty's documents, but not without paying a terrible price. The Flesh and Blood Fusion Technique contained within the documents prevented A-Qing's death from the serious illness she had contracted, but it turned her into a terrifying monster. As the only surviving subject of the experiment, her blood coincidentally resulted in the creation of a potion that enlarges humans—Titan. Lu Kunhai obtained great strength with the help of the potion.

In the tenth year of Emperor Long Wen's reign, the former patriarch of the Crane Clan, Sima Yun, adopted a baby girl of the Serpent Clan lineage, named her Yin, and raised her in the imperial villa on Crane Island. Eighteen years later, due to his wife's infertility and the longer lifespan that the Serpent Clan was blessed with at birth, which makes them the perfect historian, Sima Yun had a relationship with Yin on Crane Island and made her the bearer of his children.

While playing alone by the sea, young Yin met a friend who was trapped on the island just like her—a young girl who introduced herself as Feng Yue. Feng Yue was Yin's only companion throughout the years. When Yin's child was about to be born, she who was now trapped in the imperial villa heard about the tribulations of the Serpent Clan from Feng Yue, and Feng Yue showed her a future where she would be separated from her children. Yin decided to help Feng Yue release Heluo, and Heluo used the opportunity to inject fragments of her soul into Yin's body, ultimately tainting the children within her.

Yin gave birth to Sima Ying and Sima Yue. Due to Yin's Serpent Clan heritage, which made her mentally unstable, and the fact that they were not legally married, the children were sent back to be raised by the Crane Clan after birth. The pain of separation brought Yin to madness, and one late night, she walked into the sea and was never seen again. After the incident, Sima Yun locked down the imperial villa and forbade everyone from mentioning the incident to the outside world.

All eighteen clans ruled by the Serpent Clan must sacrifice a child to Heluo every month by sending them off into the sea on a small boat. Whenever a natural disaster struck or on the eve of a war, a blood sacrifice would be made by sacrificing the people of other clans to seek the blessing of Heluo.

The Divine Empress of Serpent made an agreement with Heluo to transform the weak Serpent Clan into an overlord. The Divine Empress reigned for one hundred and forty years, and the Dread Empress inherited the throne. Affected by the "sacred snow", the Serpent Clan underwent a huge change and gradually distanced itself from humanity. The Dread Empress was a bloody ruler who promoted human sacrifices, and so began the Serpent Empire's reign of terror that went on for thousands of years.

The Serpent Clan's leadership has mostly been in the hands of their women. While blessed with good looks, they are lacking in combat ability, resulting in them frequently facing foreign invasion. Thus, they are forced to repeatedly migrate away and pay tribute to powerful clans in order to survive. Although they attempted to take up arms and fight, it often ended in defeat and intensified oppression. This continued until their young matriarch, Feng Yue, came to power, and so the Serpent Clan ushered in the day that would change its history.

People of the land are beings with roots; people of the ocean are beings without roots. The land and ocean remain independent and do not invade each other, that is the most basic law. If a being with roots willingly believes in a god without roots, then the power of the ocean may invade the land, and when the balance is broken, the day of the ocean god's descent on land is the day the only god shall be born.

Since the reign of the Dread Empress, the people of the Serpent Clan that have completed their "evolution" used young boys to gradually awaken the power of Heluo every year. At the same time, new evil was summoned to corrupt the world.

With the Serpent Clan as a medium, Heluo was able to unleash a portion of her power, and the humans affected by it could no longer sense the passage of time and gradually lost themselves in the cycle of life and death. As for those lucky enough to escape this prison, the decay experienced in the illusion would be gradually reflected on the body. Suffering fills the world, so why not indulge in an endless dream?

The Serpent Clan lived by the sea. They did not take without restraint and remained respectful. One day, the matriarch's daughter, Feng Yue, rescued a strange fish, which led to her getting into a conflict with other clans. When Feng Yue was about to be taken away, the fish suddenly spoke in the human tongue, and it made an agreement with the Serpent Clan. From then on, the fate of the serpent and fish was intertwined. A hundred years later, the Divine Empress, Feng Yue, passed away, and snow descended from above. The Serpent Clan completed its final evolution and went completely mad.

Congratulations, Hero! You've arrived at the timeline without sadness, and this time, you have truly saved the world.

Thank you for never giving up!

Increases the Attack Speed and Movement Speed bonus from Muhurta by 80%.

Increases the trigger chance of Ink Flare by 85%
When you are carrying both [Intoxicator Brew] and [Pyrostone], increases your <color=#BF2B00>Fire DMG</color> dealt by 50%.
Increases the Fire DMG bonus from Flowing Flames by 75%.
When you are carrying [Icebreaker], your Melee attacks have a 5% chance to trigger the Core Slot effect of [Icebreaker] once.
Additionally increases the trigger chance of Shattered Ice by 10%.
When you are carrying [Pearl], increases the shield effect you gain by 15%.
Increases the shield effect bonus from Pearl Glow by 25%.
When you are carrying [Celestial Jade], your Melee and Flying Sword attacks have a 6% chance to trigger the Core Slot effect of [Celestial Jade].
When you are carrying [Celestial Jade] in your Effect Slot, you receive both Blessing of the Sun and Blessing of the Moon at the same time.
When you have [Fleeting Phantom], the last strike of your Melee attack will upgrade your next [Thunderclap] into [True Thunderclap].
Your Melee attacks have a 10% chance to turn all [Thunderclap] into [True Thunderclap] over 3s.
When you have [Brutal Thunder], Furious Thunder triggered by [Thunder] will cause an additional Thunderstorm Pulse around the target, dealing Lightning DMG equal to 60% of your ATK.
When you have both [Brutal Thunder] and [Nemesis Thunder], the Furious Thunder triggered by [Thunder] inflicts an additional 50% damage, and [Nemesis Thunder] is guaranteed to be triggered.
When [Venom Blade] is triggered, it grants an additional 200% Melee DMG.
When you have both [Venom Blade] and [Judgment Time], triggering [Venom Blade] has a 15% chance to trigger [Judgment Time] once.

When you have [Blood Splatter], the blood orbs generated by your blood bullets will transform into Bloodsuckers that automatically attack nearby enemies. Bloodsuckers deal damage equal to 10% of your ATK per second and restore HP equal to 50% of the damage dealt.
Once the total damage inflicted by Bloodsuckers reaches 100% of your ATK, they unleash a Blood Burst, dealing 200% damage to nearby enemies and instantly replenishing your HP.

When you have [Fearless], your Melee attacks generate a massive shockwave forward, dealing additional damage equal to 100% of your ATK. However, your Attack Speed is decreased by 60% and your Movement Speed is decreased by 25%.
When you have both [Fearless] and [Immovable], increases your Shock Strikes' damage by 200% and its range by 300%.
When you have [Total Madness], you lose its ATK bonus and DEF reduction, but gain a 15% chance of dealing 300% additional DMG when you deal damage.
Increases the trigger chance of Carnage by 25%.
When you have [Frenzy] and it has been stacked 20 times, increases all damage dealt by you by 30% for 5s.
When you have [Surging Ferocity] and an enemy has 10 stacks of it, immediately deals 500% Melee DMG to the enemy.
When you are carrying [Intoxicator Brew], you deal damage equal to 550% of your Melee DMG to the enemy once when you dodge an attack.
When you are carrying both [Intoxicator Brew] and [White Tiger Spirit], Melee attacks have a 5% chance to directly trigger the Core Slot effects of [Intoxicator Brew] and [Spirit of White Tiger].
When you are carrying [Stygian Lotus] in the Core Slot with [Frostbloom] in any slot, the Stygian Petals will deal 50% additional Ice DMG and have a 15% chance to inflict [Frozen] for 1s.
When you are carrying [Stygian Lotus] in the Core Slot with [Frostbloom] in any slot, your Melee DMG has a 5% chance to directly trigger the Core Slot effect of Stygian Lotus.
When you are carrying [Talisman] in the Core Slot, increases the damage of Talisman by 50%.
When you are carrying [Talisman] in the Core Slot, Cosmic Law is guaranteed to be triggered regardless of the level and quantity of Talismans.
When you are carrying [Sharp Fang] and [Snowmane], your damage against [Bleeding] enemies +60%.
When you are carrying [Sharp Fang] and [Snowmane], you have a 15% chance to shoot 6 Blood Bullets that deal damage equal to 250% of your ATK when dealing damage to [Bleeding] enemies.

When you have both [Blood Reishi] and [Trauma Soother], there is a 15% chance for you to gain any one of the three following effects for 5s when you deal damage: Increases all damage dealt by 20%, increases DEF by 20%, or restores 1% of HP each second.
Increases the buff effect from Healer by 100%.
When you have [Flying Sword Boost], doubles it its effect.
Increases the trigger chance of [Bull's Eye] by 20%.
[Formidable Force] takes effect on enemies with less than 60 HP, and [Unrivaled Strike] takes effect on enemies whose HP is above 80%.
When you have both [Formidable Force] and [Unrivaled Strike], enemies killed by you will explode, dealing 550% damage to nearby enemies.
Increases all damage dealt by you by 5% for every [Universal Skill] you have.
When you have more than 8 [Universal Skills], increases all damage dealt by you by 100%.
When you launch a Melee or Flying Sword attack: There's a 6% chance to deal 666% damage.
Upon dealing any damage: There's a 0.01% chance to trigger Divine Judgment: Programmer's Wrath
When you are carrying [Wrathblood] in the Core Slot, increases the trigger chance of Rage Burst by 10%.
When you are carrying [Wrathblood] in the Core Slot, and when your Rage Burst is over, you unleash [Asura's Fury] once to deal 2,400% Melee DMG to nearby enemies in a large area.

When you are carrying both [Big Bone] and [Icebreaker], your Melee attacks have a 15% chance to trigger a Landfall that deals Impact DMG to a wide area in front. This Landfall deals 200% Melee DMG. Damage against [Stunned] or [Frozen] enemies is increased by 100%.
The Landfall will be triggered 3 times in a row in the current direction.

When you are carrying both [Pyrostone] and [Qi Whisperer], there's a 15% chance to summon 3 Fire Tornadoes that fly out in three directions when you deal damage, dealing 105% Fire DMG to enemies hit by them upon impact.
Doubles the number of Fire Tornadoes.

Upon triggering [Extreme Cold], there is a 70% chance to summon a pool of Spring of Agony beneath the target. The Spring of Agony deals 80% Ice DMG per second to enemies within it for 5s. Enemies within its range will be considered as [Frozen].
Increases the Spring of Agony's damage by 100%, and every time it deals damage, its range will be expanded.
Increases the Crit Rate of [Ice Blade] by 10% and gives it the ability to trigger [Extreme Cold].
When you trigger [Extreme Cold] with your Flying Sword, deals 100% Ice DMG to the target and launches 6 weaker [Ice Blades] that deal 40% Ice DMG.
When you are carrying [Ghostly Strand] in the Core Slot, the [Death Curse] will continuously deal True DMG equal to 33% of your ATK to the target every second.

When you are carrying [Ghostly Strand] in the Core Slot, each time [Death Curse] inflicts damage, there is a 33% chance to shoot Strands, dealing 300% True DMG to the target and nearby enemies and inflicting [Burning], [Bleeding], and [Poisoned] on them for 5s.
When you are carrying [Tri-color Crystal], there is a 15% chance for your Melee attacks to randomly deal an additional 10% Elemental DMG of one of the following types: Fire, Lightning, or Ice DMG.
When you are carrying [Tri-color Crystal], your Melee or Flying Sword attacks will come with 15% Fire, Lightning, and Ice DMG.
When you are carrying [Tiger's Mark], the first strike of your Melee attack activates Total Annihilation, expanding your attack range and increasing damage dealt by 75%.
When you are carrying [Tiger's Mark], the first strikes of your Melee attack activate Ultimate BaHuang Break, inflicting 320% Melee DMG and stuns the enemy.
When you have both [Frostbloom] and [Perpetual Floe], increases your Ice DMG dealt by 40%.
Increases the Ice DMG bonus from Deep Cold by an additional 80%.
When you have both [Shackle of Thunder] and [Thunderstone], increases your Lightning DMG dealt by 40%.
Increases the Lightning DMG bonus from Thunder Waker by an additional 80%.
[Dragon's Demise] has a 15% chance to deal 3× damage.

When you have [Dragon's Demise], every strike you make will be replaced by Dragon's Demise. However, the damage dealt by Dragon's Demise will be reduced by 75%. You will no longer receive Attack Speed bonuses, but your Melee Attack Speed will be converted into a Melee ATK bonus.
Your [Lightning Sprint] inflicts [Timeflux] on enemies, dealing damage equal to 60% of ATK to them every second for 10s.
[Timeflux] can stack up to 5 times. Each stack increases all damage taken by enemies by 30%. When you sheathe with [Heart of Sword], it will immediately detonate the [Space Rift] on all enemies.
When you have [Twisted Dream], increases the chance for [Twisted Dream] to deal 4× damage to enemies in [Shattered Time] by 40%.
When you have [Elusive], your dashing can directly shoot out [Phantom Blades]. Damage dealt by the blades will be increased by 250%.

<color=#C83E48>[Rage Burst]</color>: After using an active or automatic skill, gain a power boost for a short time, increasing your Movement Speed, Attack Speed, and Flying Sword ATK.
<color=#C9EEFF>[Drunk]</color>: Reduces the Movement Speed and Attack Speed of enemies. If enemies take <color=#BF2B00>Fire DMG</color>, this status becomes <color=#BF2B00>[Burning]</color>.
<color=#BF2B00>[Burning]</color>: Deals <color=#BF2B00>Fire DMG</color> to enemies every second.
<color=#C549EC>[Poisoned]</color>: Deals <color=#C549EC>Poison DMG</color> equal to 4% of enemies' Max HP to enemies every second, but the damage dealt is limited by the player's ATK.
<color=#C549EC>[Poisoned]</color>: Deals <color=#C549EC>Poison DMG</color> equal to 8% of enemies' Max HP to enemies every second, but the damage dealt is limited by the player's ATK.
<color=#C83E48>[Bleeding]</color>: Deals attribute-less damage equal to 5% of enemies' current HP to enemies every second, but the damage dealt is limited by the player's ATK.
<color=#3D2D00>[Stunned]</color>: Makes the enemy unable to take any action.
<color=#73D7F1>[Frozen]</color>: Makes the enemy unable to take any action.
<color=#DDC24A>[Stasis]</color>: Makes the enemy unable to take any action.
<color=#633FAE>[Terrified]</color>: Makes the enemy unable to take any action. This status is removed when the enemy takes damage. The duration of this status is halved against bosses, and bosses take 20% less damage.
<color=#E35428>[Realgar Powder]</color>: Paralyzes enemies within range. If the Realgar Powder comes into contact with any <color=#BF2B00>flames</color>, it creates a <color=#C549EC>[Toxic Mist]</color>.
<color=#E35428>[Powerful Realgar Powder]</color>: Paralyzes enemies within range. If the Powerful Realgar Powder comes into contact with any <color=#BF2B00>flames</color>, it creates an <color=#C549EC>[Extremely Toxic Mist]</color>.

"Shuras are misbehaving, irritable, aggressive, brave, and good at fighting."
Follow 7-Sword Shura to gain powerful melee abilities that allow you to accurately attack your enemies' weaknesses, dealing a fatal blow with one strike.

<size=17>"The venerable one is wiser and more virtuous than all great saints and masters."
Follow Infinite Arhat to become a master of the sword with the power to defeat enemies from thousands of miles away with a highly destructive flying sword.
</size>

"Even a Buddha's patience is limited, and Carousing Acala is the incarnation of their rage."
Follow Carousing Acala to control strong spirits and flames, dealing multiple blows to enemies by burning and blasting them.

"As fast as thunder and as quiet as Mount Tai, harnessing the divine power of heavenly dragons to banish all evil."
Follow Thunder Vajra to gain the power of raging thunder, dealing a devastating blow to enemies with thunder and lightning.

<size=17>"The three corpses, also called the three worms or the three poisons, are the three evil desires of luxury, food, and lust."
Follow Mother Trinity to gain the power to control blood and poison, bringing out enemies' evil desires through the manipulation of blood and poison to deal great damage to them.
</size>

"The three rivers diverge and divide life and death, forming nine ice cold springs that overcome hardships."
Follow Bitter Cold Bodhi to gain the power of ice, summoning blizzards and storms to freeze your enemies and destroy them mercilessly.

<size=17>"All things contrived are like dreams, illusions, bubbles, and shadows, or as dewdrop or lightning, and should be regarded as such."
Follow Shadow-Walker to gain the great power to seize every fleeting moment on the battlefield to attack enemies relentlessly.
</size>

It isn't like you to take that long, Bi'an...
What the heck did you do?!
That was close... The Boar's patriarch is no pushover indeed...
That embezzling fool got what he deserved.
Was that the sun? Who's the woman in white?
She must be out of her mind! She lit herself on fire...
The old man has given you a new mission. There's no time to lose, let's go.
How did you beat this big guy?
It's my first time seeing a mechanism this complicated. It's a pity that such skill isn't being used for good...
Did he get rid of all these monsters by himself?
Ugh, who would have expected the once fearless general of the realm to end up like this...
Even though everyone is used to it, I still can't help but wonder why you never say a word.
Mission complete! Let's see what's up next... Huh? Wait up!
Huh? You're just leaving like that?
Are we heading out? Hmm, let's take a look at our destination.
The Tower of Fate is up ahead, be careful...
The Mansion of Enigma is just past that gorge. You're on your own now...
Boar City is in a state of unrest. There's no time to lose, let's go!
We're finally... at the imperial city...
The emperor is right down there! The final battle is upon us!
You're finally here... The Wolf's forces took us by surprise. The temple is in danger, get over there and help them.
Muahahaha! I'm finally free! Huh? What is that you're holding? Stop! Bring it over here so I can give it a nice hammering!
Get over here and let me hammer it!
Oh, what you have right there is a precious treasure!
Stop right there! Let me take a look at what you're holding!
Hahahaha! Don't go. Are you worried that I'll hammer it into bits?
Muahahaha! Do you know what you're lacking? It's courage!
It's a little crooked over here! Nothing a quick hammering can't fix!
What is this trash? It's terrible!
Finally, I'm free! That darn fatso locked me up here just because I stole some treasures from him! Shitty miser!
I will never forget this. Go on ahead, we'll meet again.
I got a few treasures today, want one?
Hey, take a look at these. Anything catch your fancy?
You don't like them? Life never is perfect.
Whoa! That's something you don't see often! Luck must be on your side!
Time to go! Come again next time!
I've been having a recurring dream lately. The world is covered in snow, and only a single huge white lotus remains among the pure white ruins...
A huge, glowing beast appeared in the blizzard, and the blizzard receded in its presence...
I dreamed of the huge white lotus again. But this time, I was trapped within it... I could only watch as the snow buried me...
Everything changed after my sister returned from the palace...
She may have committed many atrocities, but she is still my sister. I'm certain warmth and kindness still remain deep within her...
I saw the world crumbling in my dreams, but I refuse to give up hope...
Of course, I will imbue your weapons with power again. Please give me a moment.
They need to be reimbued again? It will require some souls this time, is that alright?
You will overcome this raging despair, dispel the unbridled darkness, and reach the shores of hope...
You're safe for now! Seize this opportunity to destroy the frozen black hole!
Stay strong! Destroy the Otherworld Eye and weaken the black sun!
Get inside the golden field, it's the only way to survive!
How have you been, young man?
Where are you off to now?
Thank you, young man... That darn old man, Zhao, imprisoned me here for so long... I only wanted to let those poor civilians in...
Hmm, the world has changed that much? I need some rest, I'll meet up with you later...
It's time for you to carry out your mission...
Great mother, please show us the way forward...
The rich feast while the poor starve and die!
The emperor acts in defiance, and the four clans support such evil!
Defiance of the heavens will be paid with blood.
How dare you spoil my mood!
You must be tired of living...
Oh, you're late, hero! What can you possibly do now? Just revel at the end of the world with me!
Behold the power of the stars!
Meet your end in the void!
That witch can't protect you anymore!
Why do you go against me, Sima Yue?! What good does helping him do?
Have you still not realized? This world is beyond saving!
Oh... The wheel of fate spins once again. Perhaps it is the will of the gods...
The radiator is damaged and the core has overheated. Repairs are in progress...
The radiator has been repaired. The core is working again...
Maybe... you can still save this country. Take these, his Majesty is below the hall...
I shall free you from your pain in the name of the Dragon God!
During the boss battle, an extra Boar Abomination will emerge.
As darkness envelops the area, your field of view is diminished by 50%.
The colossal tail of Heluo will periodically launch attacks at you.
Whenever you deal damage to an enemy, there's a 15% chance that you will lose 5% of your current HP.
During combat, 6 Lethal Spores will appear around you every 20-30s. These spores rapidly materialize within 1s and explode if they hit you, dealing damage equal to 30% of your Max HP.
During combat, 1 Boar-Headed Guard will periodically emerge every 20-40s, relentlessly pursuing you and dealing an extra 500% damage.
During combat, 5 Crane Assassins will periodically emerge every 20-40s, relentlessly pursuing you and inflicting an extra 100% damage.
During combat, 3 Sick Boars will periodically emerge every 20-40s, relentlessly pursuing you and inflicting an extra 150% damage.
During combat, 5 Self-destruct Devices will periodically emerge every 20-40s, relentlessly pursuing you and inflicting an extra 150% damage.
When you get hit, the Power of Courage will randomly drop nearby. If you don't pick it up, you won't be able to perform Melee attacks, Flying Sword attacks, or use the Sheath skill.
There is a 33% chance of not receiving the Choose-1-from-3 reward. The reward statue will explode.
Enemies gain 5s of invincibility when their HP is below 1%.
When you open a Sect Skill Book, two pages will be obscured by a dense fog.
When using a Healing Gourd, there is a 33% chance that it will fail to restore any HP.
When your HP drops below 15%, you will die immediately upon taking any damage.
All non-boss enemies become elites (without the elite rewards).
Nightmare Level +3, and double all the Nightmare Levels for you.
When your Nightmare Level is below 5, each level difference increases all damage taken by 50% (cannot go below 0).
Every time you launch a Melee attack, you gain a stack of [Weakened Melee] that lasts for 5s. When this effect has stacked 10 times, your Attack Speed will be reduced by 90%.
Every time you deal Flying Sword DMG, you gain a stack of [Weakened Flying Sword] that lasts for 5s. When this effect has stacked 10 times, your Flying Sword DMG will be reduced by 90%.
The first damage taken by a boss will be capped at 5% of their Max HP. Additionally, upon taking any damage, the boss will become invincible for 0.5s.
During a boss fight, whenever you take damage, you will be inflicted with Nightmare Flames, dealing True DMG equal to 2% of your Max HP per second for 15s.
Each time you take damage, surrounding enemies will restores 5% of their Max HP.
During a boss fight, your Movement Speed is limited and cannot exceed the initial speed.
When Clarity depletes and triggers the Curse of Madness, you must choose two curses.

During combat, 3 Seals of Frost will appear around you every 20-30s. These seals rapidly materialize within 1s. Explode if touched, causing DMG equal to 15% of your Max HP and freezes the player for 1s.
The number of Blue Souls gained +500%. However, every 50 Blue Souls you possess increase all damage taken by you by 1%.
Upon getting the Curse of Madness, your Max HP drops by 10%.
Every Curse of Madness you possess increases all damage taken by you by 5% and reduces all damage dealt by you by 2%.
Every 1% of your current HP you lose increases all damage taken by you by 2%.
Every 1% of additional HP you have increases all damage taken by you by 1%.
Upon dealing Elemental DMG, there is a 15% chance to inflict Terrified on yourself for 2s. (can be triggered up to once every 10s)
When dashing, you have a 15% chance to instantly fall down.
Upon falling down, you will lose 50% of your current HP.
When the Boss's HP falls below 10%, they will become immune to any damage for the next 10s.
The Dark Tide will appear every 20-40 seconds in the battle, dealing damage equal to 10% of your Max HP. Each time it attacks, its damage increases by 5% for the rest of the game.
When you return to the transfer station, only one gourd will be replenished for you.
You lose 10% of your current HP when using a Core Slot skill.
The cooldown of your Sheath skill is increased by 10s, which cannot be affected by any other effects.
During a boss fight, 16 Nightmare Calamities will descend within 2s every 20-40s, dealing damage equal to 8% of your Max HP and reducing 5 Clarity.
When you are hit from the back, your damage taken is increased by 100%.
Non-boss enemies will not take more than 1 damage for the first 5 hits taken.
Non-boss enemies throw out Nightmare Bombs upon death, which will explode after 0.5s of flight, dealing damage equal to 10% of your Max HP.
Non-boss enemies leave behind a Venomous Mire upon death. Standing on the mire reduces Movement Speed by 50% and deals damage equal to 7% of Max HP per second.
The boss creates a Venomous Mire after dealing damage to you. Standing on the mire reduces Movement Speed by 50% and deals damage equal to 7% of Max HP per second.
Killing a boss reduces your ATK by 10%.
Rage skills have a 20% chance of failing, providing no effect even if Rage is consumed.
Non-boss enemies summon Flesh Monsters upon death.
When your HP falls below 50%, non-boss enemies' Movement Speed is increased by 60% and their damage dealt by 30%.
When non-boss enemies' HP drops below 30%, their damage dealt is increased by 50%.
When non-boss enemies' HP drops below 20%, their damage dealt is increased by 100%.
When your Nightmare Level drops, each level dropped will costs 5% of your HP.
During boss fights, if your combat time exceeds 600s, all damage taken by you will be increased by 300%.
During combat, 5 Spike Traps will appear around you every 20-30s. Upon touching these traps, you will take damage equal to 20% of your Max HP, and keep [Bleeding] for 5s.
Upon death, non-boss enemies provide a 10% HP boost to nearby regular enemies. This effect can stack indefinitely.
Upon death, non-boss enemies provide a 10% damage boost and a 5% Movement Speed boost to nearby regular enemies. This effect can stack indefinitely.
You lose 1% of Max HP when taking damage.
After choosing the Curse of Madness, your Clarity recovered will be reduced by 50%.
There is a 20% chance for equipped Relics to drop when you take damage.
There is a 20% chance for your Weapons to drop when you take damage.
There is a 50% chance that you will not receive any bonus from Relic Refinement.
When attacked, there is a 20% chance of being inflicted with Confused for 2s.
When attacked, there is a 20% chance of being inflicted with Burning for 5s.
When attacked, there is a 20% chance of being inflicted with Bleeding for 5s.
When attacked, there is a 20% chance of being inflicted with Poisoned for 5s.
Attacks from outside your field of view deal 100% more damage.
Increases all your damage taken by 20%.
Reduces your Sheath Skill Cooldown by 20%.

1. Enemies get stronger with each level in Endless Mode.
2. In Never-Ending Nightmare, you will no longer fall into a deep sleep. Instead, you will be forced to choose a Curse of Madness and all your Clarity will be restored.
3. In Never-Ending Nightmare, the player must choose a Curse of Madness once whenever they clear 10 levels.
Clear White Ash difficulty while using this sect
Reach Never-Ending Nightmare Level 50 while using this sect

<size=14>"The sun representing yang and the moon representing yin alternate endlessly in the sky, nourishing all things with their dazzling brilliance."
Followers of Wheels of Solar and Lunar will receive the blessings of the sun and the moon, gaining the power to harness the blazing heat of the sun and freezing cold of the moon to deal heavy blows to enemies.
</size>
Immediately triggers [Opposing Extremes] and increases the damage of your next [Solar Flare Slash] or [Lunar Frost] Blade by 100%.
Consumes all your Solar Points or Lunar Points, whichever is higher, to increase your Attack Speed by 25% for 4s.

<size=11>・Gain the Solar-Lunar gauge with 50 <color=#E35428>Solar Points</color> and 50 <color=#73D7F1>Lunar Points</color>. Consuming <color=#E35428>Solar Points</color> will increase your <color=#73D7F1>Lunar Points</color>, vice versa.

・Upon reaching 100 <color=#73D7F1>Lunar Points</color>, you enter the <color=#73D7F1>[Lunar Eclipse]</color> state for 4s, which increases the damage of your <color=#73D7F1>[Lunar Frost Blade]</color> by 50% during this time
</size>

<size=14>・Lose the Flying Swords ability. Flying Swords becomes [Opposing Extremes]: You gain the ability to switch freely between <color=#E35428>[Solar Flare]</color> and <color=#73D7F1>[Lunar Frost]</color>.

The cooldown becomes 45s.
