Warm snow descends from the colossal white lotus that has blotted out the sky.
Rumor has it that it is the wrath of gods
The gods sent down their wrath
And chaos plagued the world of man
Mother, look! The snow, it's warm!
"Only the eradication of the clans can appease the gods."
Proceed carefully for the path ahead is long and arduous
Ohohoho, it's a journey well done, don't you think so too, He—ro!
Hoho, that was intense. You almost did it.
What surprises have you brought me now?
Ah... You're finally here. I've been yearning to see you again.
Brought more delicious souls for me?
What will you do to please me today?
Oh, how wonderful. Give me more... give me more souls...
Be careful during your travels, hero. You're very dear to me.
Leaving so soon? But I don't want to let you go...
Hurry off, I'm going to bed.
Come on, hero, don't bore me.
Oh... The wheel of fate spins once again. Perhaps it is the will of the gods...
Qian of the sky, it is heaven's might that crushes all...
Kun of the earth is one with man...
Zhen of thunder rumbles through the land...
Gen is the mountains, immovable and strong...
Xun, winds that stop for nothing...
Flames of Li turn all to ash...
Cold springs of Kan flow endlessly...
Dui is like a poison swamp with serpents lurking beneath...
Sword of the Four Saints! Heed my call!
Oh, you're late, hero! What can you possibly do now? Just revel at the end of the world with me!
Behold the power of the stars!
Meet your end in the void!
That witch can't protect you anymore!
Why do you go against me, Sima Yue?! What good does helping him do?
Have you still not realized? This world is beyond saving!
I can't hold on much longer! She's about to drag you back out there!
You think you can leave while everyone is watching?!
This is just a dream... But how I wish you would rest in my arms...
This dream... cannot be allowed to end like this...
Kneel thrice and kowtow nine times to express your piety!
The white lotus descends to deliver us all!
May the lotus cleanse the world!
Great mother! Give me the strength to punish this unfilial child!
Punishment of thorns! Torment the evil!
Forgive me... great mother... I've failed you...
You live up to your reputation! You are worthy of witnessing my power that rivals the gods!
The world is but a cruel place that treats all of us like trash!
NO! My mechanical modification... is the last hope to save the world! But you've destroyed it all!
With a thousand swings of the hammer!
This hammer is really good! I think I'll test it on you!
You don't stand a chance without the divine weapon...
Oh! You want this one, and you like that one... Then take this!
I'll give you a few extra! Here, take them!
Endless mountains of gold and treasure...
The heavens work in mysterious ways...
Machinery is the only way forward...
Let the sacred snow bring eternal peace to the world!
Send them to the bridal chamber!
Summons 1 Solar-Lunar Wheel to help you in battle.

Upon triggering [Solar Eclipse], Solar-Lunar Wheel transforms into Solar Flare Wheel and attacks the farthest enemies with solar bast, dealing 5,000% Fire DMG and inflicting [Burning] for 3s.
Upon triggering [Lunar Eclipse], Solar-Lunar Wheel transforms into Lunar Frost Wheel and attacks the farthest enemies with frost blast, dealing 5,000 Ice DMG and inflicting [Frozen] for 1.5s.
Upon triggering [Howling Celestial Hound], there is a 30% chance to trigger it 1 additional time.
The additionally triggered [Howling Celestial Hound] can also trigger [Howling Celestial Hound], and the Fire and Ice DMG bonus granted by [Howling Celestial Hound] can stack up to 10 times.
Increases the trigger chance of [Scarlet King's Domain] by 67%.
[Scarlet King's Domain] moves with you. For every enemy that dies inside it, its duration increases by 0.5s, area increases by 5%, up to 100%, and damage increases by 5%, up to 100%.
Upon triggering [Black and White Impermanence], inflicts [Burning], [Bleeding], and [Poisoned].
[Flurry of Strokes] is guaranteed to mark 6 strokes.
Upon inflicting [Myriad Marks] while having [Myriad], there is a 20% chance to attack enemies with [Blade Spirit] once without cost.
When a [Myriad Mark] is removed, deals 200% True DMG to enemies and increases the trigger chance of [Myriad Forms] by 67%.

While [Heaven Break] lasts, your normal [Blade Spirit] attacks grant you [Heaven Breaking Force] upon dealing damage, which increases the damage of your next [Colossal Blade] by 25%. Stacks up to 4 times.

Normal [Blade Spirit] attacks have a 33% chance to grant 2 stacks of [Heaven Breaking Force]. Upon reaching 4 stacks of [Heaven Breaking Force], your next normal [Blade Spirit] attack becomes [Colossal Blade].

When you are carrying [Toxin Pouch] in the Core Slot, Toxic Miasma shoots 4 Poison Bombs that track enemies nearby every second, dealing 300% Poison DMG to enemies and inflicting them with [Poisoned] for 5s.

Increases the damage of [Toxic Miasma] and [Poison Bombs] by 60%. Upon hitting an enemy, [Poison Bomb] has a 25% chance to deal an additional 100% True DMG and shoot 3 new [Poison Bombs] (these new Poison Bombs can't trigger this effect).

When you are carrying [Mutated Limb], after dealing Melee DMG to [Bleeding] enemies 7 times, you will trigger [Severe Bleeding] and immediately deal damage equal to 30% of Max HP to the enemy (no more than 1,000% of your ATK).
Upon triggering [Severe Bleeding] 3 times, your Melee attack becomes [Blood Blade] with its damage increased by 100% and a 15% chance to directly inflict [Severe Bleeding] for 5s.
This is an ordinary sword. Using it increases the bonus of [Resolute Tactics] by 50%.
When you have both [Savage Tornado] and [Resolute Tactics], your Melee attacks have a 5% chance to deal 2,000 damage.
When you are knocked down: Increases all your damage by 100%.
You are treated as always being knocked down.
When you are carrying both [Mercury] and [Darter Balm], your Attack Speed increases by 50% for 3s when you deal True Poison DMG.

When you are carrying [Darter Balm] in the Core Slot and carrying [Mercury] in any slot, when you gain [Oiled], you also gain [Poison Coating], which grants your Melee attacks 100% True Poison DMG for 5s. Stacks up to 10 times.
When you are carrying [Saberstone], upon Sheathing, shoot 4 Soul Blades at nearby enemies, each dealing 100% Flying Sword DMG.

When carrying [Saberstone], upon Sheathing, you gain 1 stack of [Spiritual Wind], which shoots 1 additional blade in front of you when using Soul Blade and increases all Soul Blades' damage by 25% for 5s. Stacks up to 8 times.
When you are carrying [Seed of Life], increases the duration of Magic Bloom by 50%.
After your Magic Bloom attacks 5 times, it grows excessively, increasing in size, dealing 150% more damage, and shooting 3 barbs.
Every additional percent of Max HP increases the area of [Mountain Stance] by 1%.
When you have both [Mountain Stance] and [Sleeping Arhat], each strike of Sleeping Arhat will be followed up by [Mountain Stance] once.
When you have both [First Blade] and [Final Blade], increases your Melee DMG by 60%.
Your first blow and last blow of a Melee attack have a 15% chance to attack with [Blade Flurry], which is regarded as a four-slash combo that triggers all Melee attack effects.
When you only have 1 [Healing Gourd] left, increases all your damage dealt by 25% and DEF by 5%.
When using [Healing Gourd], increases all your damage by 75% for 10s. If this is your last [Healing Gourd], its effect and duration are doubled.
When you are carrying [Teal Steel] in the Core Slot, Melee attacks have a 7% chance to trigger Teal Steel Slash.

I've been searching for a very long time, but no one is willing to tell me anything...
I've done everything I could, but I've still failed to find them...
I yearn to see them one more time...
Tell me! Did you hide them away?!
Where are they?! Your children are dead... It was you! You! You killed my children!
You took away all my hope!
Can you feel this tearing pain?
My heart is dead... And I can't even see them again.
I'm coming to keep you company, my children...
How dare you forget the Serpent Clan's terror?!
Those who challenge the Serpent Clan will be stabbed through the heart!
Such a weak being dares to look me in the eyes?
How unexpected! You've come to me like a good little insect.
Is this sad and laughable history of yours even worth saving?
Lowly ants. This world was ours from the day it was born... Let me show you the great glory of the first empire!
Darn it! Darn it! Darn it! This world will come to an end, and your sad and worthless civilization will be reduced to dust!
The dragon's fall is but an inevitability of time. In the annals of time, only the stars shine eternally...
The proud and great Tiger General, the empire's rampart, but what was even protected in the end?
Fools often ask where fate begins, and the wise should know where fate ends. But it is clear the old man does not understand.
Foolish observer. The stars have your answers, so why suffer so much?
Greedy, cowardly, and foolish. Did you really think that the power you stole is yours? How ridiculous!
Lucky insect! You should be honored to witness this ancient sunset!
The abyss will devour everything. The end is upon us.
Little Fish: Feng Yue... Feng Yue... I'm so cold... Feng Yue... I'm... so cold... Feng Yue...
What have you done?! My power... It's fading!
Oh how I missed such power... Delicious...
A tiny insect like you dreams of saving her? Hahaha!
My power... is finally complete! I'm invincible now!
What are you doing?! Stop! You traitor!
Let's see if you can entertain me again.
Sink into the ocean with despair...
What a pity... You couldn't save anything in the end!
Accept the tragic reality before you!
Phew... Bi'an... You're finally... awake... We can't hold on... for much longer... We need... your help... Huff...
Their threat has grown. We don't have much time.
More revived monsters may be waiting ahead. Be careful.
This darn boar is causing trouble for us even in death.
Darn it, the evil god is watching us.
According to our investigation, the island we are heading to is a forbidden area of the Crane Clan, and the power that draws Sima Yue is likely to be there.
I've spent the last few years on land, so sailing for a few days at sea makes me feel quite uneasy.
Luckily, you're here with me, and I can use this opportunity to tell you what happened in the past few years...
Hey! Stop daydreaming! Are such "trivial matters" enough to shock you?
I'm sure your experiences over the years are nothing ordinary, so tell us about it next time!
Why do you look so exhausted? Head inside and get some rest! I'll take care of everything while we're on the road!
I don't know why, but it feels like the wind and waves on the sea have calmed down a little. This is a good sign!
I didn't expect the evil god to have such a card up her sleeve...
Let's look for a place to settle down. It doesn't seem... very peaceful here.
Our time is running out! Hurry!
How about I explore ahead while you get some rest?
There's no time to lose! Let's go!
You are still so reliable and so reluctant to talk...
Oh, the world has changed tremendously in the last ten years. Rushing forward like this will only get you lost.
Is it time to go? Come with me, I know the way!
You can rest a little longer. I'm here to watch over you!
Let's go to Boar City first. They have the strongest ships in the world there.
You'll see Crane Island if you walk along the Tower of Fate toward the coastline. That's our destination.
The Crane Clan's forbidden area is on this island. Let's split up and search for it.
No one has been here before, so be extra careful!
I didn't expect to see such a huge place down here...
Are these the ruins of the Serpent Dynasty?
I brought you the goods everyone collected. I hope they will be of some use to you.
New goods have arrived. Come over and have a look.
Have you collected more blue energy? Old Mo's experiments are stuck again.
Come over here quickly and rest. I sense extreme danger up ahead.
Grab a few more, it's all we can help you with.
We've collected lots of stuff like this over the years, but they have to be shipped over slowly.
Old Mo needs this blue energy to create stronger devices to help you.
Are you not satisfied with this? But apart from you, we find it very difficult to distinguish them.
I believe no hardships can stop you!
I'll urge them to speed up the delivery. The next shipment of goods will arrive soon.
Bi'an, you're the only one we can count on.
Are you ready? The waves have subsided lately, so we can take this opportunity to cross the strait and sail for Crane Island.
Their true power is only revealed in your hands.
I've had them for so long. I can only wonder how much power they have left in them.
These remains still exude powerful soul energy. Maybe we can use it to find Sima Yue...
Wait... Take this... And don't lose it.
I don't really need that many souls to forge you a divine weapon!
What are you standing there for? Hammer away!
How could you treat a blacksmith like this?!
I guarantee that I won't hammer it to bits!
Once, just once! Let me hammer it just once!
Clang-Clang-Clang! The flying hammer is here!
Hahahaha! I knew you couldn't live without me!
Hahaha! You're brave! I like that!
Bahahahaha! I'd expect nothing less from myself!
Hahahahaha! This is the true skill of the best blacksmith in the world!
Don't run away! Let's go again!
I'll only take forty this time, now put the sword down!
A tiny failure is not worth such a fuss!
Is it possible that this weapon isn't right for you?
What are you looking at? You're not thinking this is my act of retaliation against you, right?
I really hammered it to bits?
It'll be even better next time. Won't you give it a try?
I get the souls, you get the goods. I've even gone above and beyond.
You can go, but release me before you leave.
I haven't had a dream in a long time, or perhaps... Reality is my dream...
I sense a call coming from the depths of my soul. It is telling me to... return home?!
This unfamiliar yet familiar feeling. It seems to be looking forward to meeting me.
The more I advance, the calmer my heart gets...
I want to become a ray of light...
If this is fate, then I will face it.
I will await your return no matter what.
Hope never dies while you remain, and the snow will stop...
This is all I can do for you...
If you're not satisfied, I can try again.
Don't worry, I will find you a suitable weapon...
Forgive me, I've exhausted too much soul energy... I'm sorry...
I can go on. I just need more souls from you.
I really... didn't expect that I would see you again...
Ahhhhh! Heluo is absorbing my power...
No matter what happens to me... You must stop it!
Being able to see you again... It's all... I ever... wanted...
You are... finally here... A voice... It has been guiding me here... It sounds like my sister... I think I'm... almost home...
No! You must stop her! Heluo is using this gigantic monster to absorb souls, and she is about to start the incarnation ritual... I can't hold on for much longer!
I thought I would never see you again. Today's treasures are definitely the best!
I haven't gotten rusty in all these years, so choose something good!
Only you can make the best of these treasures.
What else do you want? I'll get it for you later!
I would love to give you more for free, but my circumstances don't allow it!
That's all for now. I'll bring you better things next time!
It's been a while... Young man...
I still have a little more to give...
You are not suitable for modification, you are not...
I hope I never see you here again...
If only I was a little more skilled...
This is the power of knowledge.
Let me get some rest and think about what else I have left...
Oh my! I thought you would never come to me again!
Next time, don't sleep for so long!
How will you save the world if you can't even complete these tiny trials?
Don't worry, I won't bring harm to you. I helped you steal... Achoo! I'm freezing!
My treasures are not something her trash can compare to!
It took quite a bit of effort to find these for you. Aren't you going to have a look?
You must defeat the demon king!
Warrior! Take your sword and advance!
Sima Yue: Bi'an, thank you for everything. I know the whole story now. This calamity started by my ancestors will end with me...

Here! I'm here! I've finally found you!
That's the end of today's story. Everyone, it's time to go back!
Teacher, teacher, what happened to the heroes after that?
After that, everyone started new lives.
Some returned to their homelands to rebuild their homes.
Teacher, what about the last person?
The weak Serpent Clan accepted the power of the god without roots,
becoming this god's representative on this land.
After the ancient agreement was broken, the scales were thrown out of balance.
I will renew the agreement in the name of Heluo the new god.
People of the god without roots,
and follow me back to the sea!
Our days invading the land of roots have ended!
I swear with the heaven and earth as my witness!
